entry.title: Sony XBR-77A1E 77-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart BRAVIA OLED TV, Works with Alexa
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sony
Type: TVs
Price: 7998.00

True reality comes to life with perfect black and color. Sony's OLED TV creates exquisite, unprecedented contrast with over 8 million precisely and individually controlled self-illuminating pixels. Immerse yourself completely in the entertainment with sound that comes from the entire screen, with the world’s first Acoustic Surface.

Precise contrast, absolute blacks

True reality comes to life with deep black and natural color. Over 8 million self-illuminating pixels are precisely and individually controlled by the X1 Extreme™ processor. Sony's OLED TV creates exquisite, unprecedented contrast.

The greatest sound you've never seen

Unlike most TV speakers, sound comes to you from the entire screen, immersing you in exciting new entertainment experiences. It's pictures and sound in perfect harmony.

360 degrees of sophistication

This OLED TV is more than just beautiful. It's designed so that the stand and speakers virtually disappear—appearing as if it's floating—leaving only the brilliance of its picture.

Make smart even smarter

With the Google Assistant built in, Sony TV offers the ultimate viewing experience. Quickly access your favorite movies or TV shows, get answers, and control your Sony TV and other connected devices around your home, simply by using your voice.

General specifications:

Discover incredible contrast on an OLED 4K HDR TV with 8 million self-emitting pixels. Pictures are amazingly real with the deepest blacks providing detailed shadow expression and vibrant color. Innovative Acoustic Surface™ technology delivers engaging sound directly from the screen.

  • Available in 55" class (54.6" diag), 65" class (64.5" diag), 77" class (76.7" diag)
  • 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme
  • OLED
  • Acoustic Surface™ technology
  • Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
  • Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 57.3" x 32.9" x 3.5", TV with stand: 57.3" x 32.9" x 13.4"
  • Smart functionality gives you access to your favorite apps and content using Sony’s Android TV. Power Requirements: (voltage):AC 120V for UL cUL AC 110-240V for other
  • Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of High Dynamic Range (HDR) for the most lifelike picture
  • The OLED panel’s native 120Hz refresh rate is enhanced by Motionflow XR gives you the fast moving action scenes with no motion blur
  • Currently supports HDR10 & HLG (with latest software). Can support Dolby vision in future updates
  • Inputs: 4 – HDMI, 2 - USB2.0, 1 – USB3.0, 1 – Composite
Package contains:
  • Voice Remote Control (RMF-TX201U)
  • Batteries (R03)
  • AC Power Cord Spec (US, 2pin, flat blades, Polarity)
  • IR Blaster (1-849-161-12)
  • Operating Instructions
  • Quick Setup Guide / Supplement CUE (GA)
  • Table Top Stand (Separate, assemble required)

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Sony XBR-65A8F 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart BRAVIA OLED TV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sony
Type: TVs
Price: 3498.00

Power and finesse. Sony’s A8F BRAVIA OLED TV combines processing power with beautiful OLED picture and a sleek design to bring in a new standard of home entertainment. The X1 Extreme processor up converts your content to near-4K HDR quality, bringing stunning contrast and absolute blacks to your favorite shows and movies.

Step closer to reality

See how our latest OLED screen, processor and sound technologies come together for breathtaking 4K HDR TV entertainment.

Experience unbelievable contrast

True reality comes to life with deep black and natural color. Over 8 million self-illuminating pixels are precisely and individually controlled by the X1™ Extreme processor. Sony's 4K OLED TV creates exquisite, unprecedented contrast.

More power, more performance, more beauty

Our 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme includes powerful real-time image processing for ultra detailed pictures. Images are upscaled closer to true 4K HDR quality.

The greatest sound you've never seen

Unlike most TV speakers, sound comes to you from the entire screen, immersing you in exciting new entertainment experiences. It's pictures and sound in perfect harmony.

Life’s brilliance, revealed with extra colors

See vivid real-world colors all around you. A TRILUMINOS Display maps colors from a wider palette, faithfully reproducing every shade and hue in the umbrellas.

Discreetly designed for the screen

This 4K HDR OLED TV has a clean, minimalist design that keeps you focused on what’s important — the picture.

Make smart even smarter

With the Google Assistant built in, Sony TV offers the ultimate viewing experience. Quickly access your favorite movies or TV shows, get answers, and control your Sony TV and other connected devices around your home, simply by using your voice.

Specifications and features:

Experience this 4K HDR OLED TV, featuring Dolby Vision, Acoustic Surface and high contrast ratio with pure black.

  • Available in 55" class (54.6" diag), 65" class (64.5" diag)
  • 4K High Dynamic Range
  • 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme
  • OLED
  • Acoustic Surface™ technology

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Samsung QN85Q900 85-Inch QLED Smart 8K UHD TV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 14997.99

Our best TV ever combines true-to-life 8K HDR picture quality, AI-powered intelligent upscaling², stunning design, and smart home ready features, for a revolutionary TV experience.

Enter a world of 8K resolution

Samsung QLED 8K Q900's exceptional depth, detail and high resolution transports you into a new dimension of groundbreaking picture quality.

Turn what you love into 8K

With intelligent upscaling developed thru AI², QLED 8K converts today's content into stunning 8K for improved details and sharpened definition. Enjoy clear and precise images with 8K-level picture quality, reduced noise and sharpened definition.

Intelligence redefined

The Quantum Processor 8K enables today's content to be remastered into stunning 8K detail. It also optimizes sound for each scene, adjusts brightness to the room's environment and customizes content recommendations.

Automatic adaptation

Amazing intelligence built-in to every scene by adapting the picture brightness and sound to match the conditions of the room.

No more blank screens

Ambient Mode™ helps QLED mingle with your home décor for a perfectly natural effect. Instead of a simple black screen, you’ll see meaningful images that match your lifestyle, with easy settings and plenty of choices.

Features:
  • Real 8K resolution
  • 8K AI Upscaling
  • Quantum processor 8K
  • Quantum HDR 24x
  • 100% color volume

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Samsung QN82Q8F 82-Inch QLED Smart 4K UHD TV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 4997.99

More than a billion shades of our most phenomenal quantum color and our best full array backlighting redefine luxury viewing. Exquisite design with clutter-free cabling and Ambient Mode transform TV into purposeful canvas.

See the world in a billion colors

Push the boundaries of color with proprietary Quantum Dots, over a billion shades, and 100% color volume* - all reserved for our flagship QLED TVs.

Pump up the color

The secret behind color is it may fade in bright scenes; QLED TVs with 100% Color Volume* rejuvenate color in challenging content for a brilliant visual experience.

Engineered to last

As some TVs age, you may see that colors are less vibrant . QLED TVs are built to last and provide a vibrant picture even after long periods of time. Our metal alloy quantum dot pixels feature inorganic materials that are engineered for durability and resistance to fading.

Disappearing act

With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information and your own photos, you won’t notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor, and it can even play a bit of light background music.

Features:
  • Q Contrast EliteMax
  • Q HDR EliteMax
  • Ambient mode
  • Smart TV with Bixby voice
  • One remote
General specifications:
  • Type: Boundless 360 Design with Clean Back Finish
  • Screen type: flat panel
  • Backlighting: Edge-lit LED
  • Resolution: 3,840 x 2,160
  • Screen size: 81.5" Measured Diagonally

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Samsung QN75Q8C Curved 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 6797.99

Introducing QLED TV, our most spectacular TV yet. An unbelievably brilliant picture made possible by over a billion colors, producing images you have to see to believe. With 100% color volume thanks to Samsung's proprietary Quantum dots, picture quality and color volume have been elevated beyond any prior Samsung product. As smart as it is beautiful, the new Smart TV knows what’s connected and lets you control everything with one remote.

100% color volume

With 100% color volume and over a billion shades of color thanks to Samsung's proprietary Quantum dots, the colors on the Samsung QLED TV stay true even in the bright scenes.

Magnificient depth and contrast

Q |4K HDR Elite delivers elite contrast and expanded color detail, even in the brightest and darkest areas in any scene.

Incredible fluid motion

Enjoy smooth, crisp action even in the fastest scenes. Motion Rate 240 brings sports and fast moving content to life.

Curved boundless 360° design

The no-bezel design and clean brushed metal back finish look gorgeous front to back, whether mounted on the wall or sitting on a stand.

Features:
  • QLED with Quantum Dot
  • Curved panel
  • 360 design with metal back
  • One remote
  • Built-in WiFi
General specifications:
  • Backlighting: Edge-lit LED
  • Design: ZERO (Simple Edge)
  • Bezel width: 4 Bezel-less
  • Resolution: 3,840 × 2,160
  • Motion rate: 240

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

Ambient Mode™ helps QLED mingle with your home décor for a perfectly natural effect. Instead of a simple black screen, you’ll see meaningful images that match your lifestyle, with easy settings and plenty of choices.

Features:
  • Real 8K resolution
  • 8K AI Upscaling
  • Quantum processor 8K
  • Quantum HDR 24x
  • 100% color volume

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

entry.title: Samsung QN65Q9 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 5997.99

Introducing QLED TV, our most spectacular TV yet. An unbelievably brilliant picture made possible by over a billion colors, producing images you have to see to believe. With 100% color volume thanks to Samsung's proprietary Quantum dots, picture quality and color volume have been elevated beyond any prior Samsung product. As smart as it is beautiful, the new Smart TV knows what’s connected and lets you control everything with one remote.

100% color volume

With 100% color volume and over a billion shades of color thanks to Samsung's proprietary Quantum dots, the colors on the Samsung QLED TV stay true even in the bright scenes.

Magnificient depth and contrast

Q |4K HDR Elite delivers elite contrast and expanded color detail, even in the brightest and darkest areas in any scene.

Incredible fluid motion

Enjoy smooth, crisp action even in the fastest scenes. Motion Rate 240 brings sports and fast moving content to life.

Boundless 360° design

The no-bezel design and clean brushed metal back finish look gorgeous front to back, whether mounted on the wall or sitting on a stand.

Features:
  • QLED with Quantum Dot
  • Flat panel
  • 360 design with metal back
  • One remote
  • Built-in WiFi
General specifications:
  • Backlighting: Edge-lit LED
  • Design: ZERO (Simple Edge)
  • Bezel width: 4 Bezel-less
  • Resolution: 3,840 × 2,160
  • Motion rate: 240
